events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving rear-end collision on highway 45, requesting claim initiation.
Claim assigned to cluster Auto Accident after review indicated damage to vehicle resulting from collision.
Insurance agent Sarah Johnson assigned to handle the client's auto accident claim for further processing.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to customer confirming receipt and next steps in vehicle collision claim.
Request sent for police report, photographs of damage, and driver's license copy to support the accident claim.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including police report and photos related to the car accident.
Investigation team initiated review of submitted documents and inspected the damaged vehicle at repair shop.
Investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault and estimated repair costs have been evaluated.
Settlement proposal sent to the customer covering full repair costs and rental car reimbursement.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt assessment and comprehensive settlement offer provided.
Final approval granted for the auto accident claim following customer's acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved auto repair and rental expenses issued to the customerâ€™s bank account.
Claim successfully closed after completion of payment and customer confirmation of issue resolution.
All claim documents and records archived as per company policy for the closed auto accident case.
